name: No Way Up
description:
After being dumped quite unceremoniously into a hallway with no visible exits, or walls... or floors, our protagonist (Let's call him... Toby?) must get to the bottom of this mystery.

Solve puzzles, avoid traps, dodge enemies, collect crystals, don't get lost and you might just escape The Void.

Featuring first person, third person, dark levels, panicked running - All available to be switched off in the options menu to customise the game to your preferences.
